enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve setting up a loan with a specified loan and collateral coin, which can be reused for setting up the test environment.
Both methods involve operations on a loan, which can share similar setup steps for the test environment.
The method flexibleLoanLtvAdjustHistory retrieves history related to LTV adjustments, which can inform the assertions for the flexibleLoanAdjustLtv method.
The method flexibleLoanOngoingOrders can provide insights into the current state of loans, which can be used to verify the effects of the LTV adjustment.
